From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-02 15:24
Subject: Introducing Drive on Teams, Sustainability Week 2025 Recap, Enabling Assurance,Unlocking Visibility, Chitosan Dyson First in the GCC region, First MAC store in Egypt, Think Before You Click
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Introducing DRIVE on Teams

Have you noticed the launch of DRIVE on Microsoft Teams? Making it easier to access key HR and performance tools without leaving your workflow.

With this new integration, you can request and approve time off, give and receive feedback, update goals, and delegate tasks and more, all directly within Teams. 

Need help getting started? Follow the step-by-step guide available in English <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1193&user=10620>  or Arabic <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1194&user=10620>  and watch the demo video <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1195&user=10620>  to see DRIVE in action.

Need help getting started? Follow the step-by-step guide available in English <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1193&user=10620>  or Arabic <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1194&user=10620>  and watch the demo video <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1195&user=10620>  to see DRIVE in action.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1195&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-6-min.png> 	

Sustainability Week 2025 Recap

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1196&user=10620> 	

During Sustainability Week 2025, our teams across the region came together to turn our commitments into action — championing initiatives that support environmental responsibility, community well-being, and long-term impact.

From team challenges and workshops to purposeful community outreach, our countries united with passion and purpose to drive meaningful change.

Discover more about our ongoing efforts in our latest Sustainability Report <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1196&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-1-min.png> 	

Unlocking Visibility, Enabling Assurance!

Chalhoub Business Process Universe – live on our Internal Audit Page

chunks.text:
Discover more about our ongoing efforts in our latest Sustainability Report <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1196&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-1-min.png> 	

Unlocking Visibility, Enabling Assurance!

Chalhoub Business Process Universe – live on our Internal Audit Page

What is it and how can it help the business?
    - A comprehensive repository of all mapped business processes                by Vertical & BU
    - A foundation for policies, procedures & RACI design
    - An enabler for workflow and end-to-end process mapping
    - A strategic tool for audit planning & risk mapping

Visit the <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1197&user=10620> IA page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1197&user=10620>  to explore more.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1197&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-1-min.png> 	

Chitosan Dyson First in the GCC region

This marks a significant milestone for our group as we expand our innovative product offerings in this market.

With cutting-edge technology and a commitment to excellence, the Chitosan Dyson range is set to redefine industry standards and enhance customer experience. It is exclusively available at all Sephora stores, as well as Dyson stores, both online and in-store , so hurry and get your piece!

With cutting-edge technology and a commitment to excellence, the Chitosan Dyson range is set to redefine industry standards and enhance customer experience. It is exclusively available at all Sephora stores, as well as Dyson stores, both online and in-store , so hurry and get your piece!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/e4959560ae277f710bf91f0aeea3316598704044.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-7-min.png> 	

First MAC Store In Egypt

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/21063023850fc6d0489770002af9d0cd758567225.gif> 	

MAC Cosmetics is pleased to announce the opening of its first store in Egypt, located at City Centre Almaza, marking an iconic debut in the heart of Cairo’s beauty scene.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/06-4-min.png> 	

Think Before You Click


Phishing attacks are getting more sophisticated. Always hover over links before clicking, and verify unexpected emails—even from internal addresses.
Read more. <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1198&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1198&user=10620> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1199&user=10620>
